courseDetails.title: Rekrutmen AI: Otomatisasi & Optimasi Proses Perekrutan [ID]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Otomasi | Teknologi Sumber Daya | Akuisisi Bakat | Teknologi SDM | Penjangkauan Kandidat | ChatGPT | Analitik Prediktif
courseDetails.longDescription:
AI dalam Rekrutmen dan Sumber Daya: Otomatiskan dan Optimalkan Proses Pencarian Talenta Anda


Kursus “AI dalam Rekrutmen dan Sourcing” dari Mike Pritula Academy dirancang untuk membekali profesional HR, perekrut, dan sourcer dengan pengetahuan dan keterampilan untuk mengintegrasikan kecerdasan buatan (AI) secara efektif dalam proses rekrutmen mereka. Dengan memanfaatkan alat AI, peserta dapat meningkatkan efisiensi, menarik kandidat berkualitas tinggi, dan mempertahankan keunggulan kompetitif dalam lanskap akuisisi talenta.


Apa yang Akan Anda Pelajari:


• Peluang & Tren AI dalam Rekrutmen dan Sourcing:

Pahami peran AI dalam rekrutmen modern, termasuk tren terkini, inovasi, dan studi kasus sukses.


• Mengoptimalkan Teks dan Gambar Lowongan dengan AI:

Pelajari bagaimana AI membantu menyusun deskripsi pekerjaan yang efektif dan visual yang menarik.


• Seleksi Kandidat Otomatis:

Temukan cara AI menyempurnakan pencarian dan seleksi kandidat, serta integrasinya dengan sistem pelacakan pelamar (ATS).


• Otomatisasi Sourcing & Komunikasi Kandidat:

Gunakan alat AI untuk otomatisasi sourcing dan komunikasi personal yang meningkatkan engagement.


• Penilaian Kandidat & Analisis Wawancara:

Pahami penerapan AI dalam menilai kompetensi kandidat dan menganalisis wawancara secara objektif.


• Employer Branding & Marketing Rekrutmen dengan AI:

Pelajari bagaimana AI memperkuat citra perusahaan dan otomatisasi strategi pemasaran rekrutmen.


Program Kursus:


1. Peluang & Tren AI dalam Rekrutmen dan Sourcing:

– Pengantar AI dalam rekrutmen modern

– Tren dan inovasi terbaru

– Studi kasus sukses

– Risiko dan tantangan AI

– Prediksi masa depan


2. Mengoptimalkan Teks & Gambar Iklan Lowongan:

– Cara AI menyusun deskripsi pekerjaan

– Analisis dan peningkatan daya tarik iklan

– Otomatisasi pembuatan gambar

– Alat praktis & rekomendasi


3. Seleksi Kandidat Otomatis untuk Lowongan:

– AI dalam pencarian dan seleksi

– Algoritma pencocokan otomatis

– Integrasi dengan ATS

– Strategi efektif


4. Otomatisasi Sourcing & Komunikasi Kandidat:

– Alat sourcing berbasis AI

– Plugin & alat komunikasi

– Otomatisasi email sequence

– Teknik pesan personal


5. Penilaian Kandidat & Analisis Wawancara:

– Penilaian kompetensi dengan AI

– Teknologi wawancara berbasis AI

– Transkripsi & analisis otomatis

– Menilai secara objektif dan tanpa bias


6. Employer Branding & Marketing Rekrutmen:

– Peran AI dalam membangun brand

– Analisis interaksi kandidat

– Otomatisasi strategi marketing

– Ukur efektivitas kampanye


Fitur Kursus:

• Instruktur Ahli: Dipandu oleh Mike Pritula, pemimpin HR berpengalaman dalam integrasi AI.

• Pembelajaran Fleksibel: Enam pelajaran rekaman, bisa diakses kapan saja.

• Aplikasi Praktis: Tugas rumah dengan umpan balik pribadi.

• Komunitas Interaktif: Akses chat Q&A khusus untuk diskusi dan dukungan.

• Sertifikat: Dapatkan diploma setelah menyelesaikan kursus.


Siapa yang Cocok Mengikuti:


• Recruiter & Sourcer: Ingin tetap up-to-date dengan AI terbaru.

• Spesialis HR: Ingin meningkatkan efisiensi dalam akuisisi talenta.

• Manajer Rekrutmen: Mencari optimasi proses & employer branding melalui AI.


Dengan menguasai penerapan AI dalam rekrutmen dan sourcing, kamu akan mempercepat proses perekrutan, menarik talenta terbaik, dan memperkuat posisi di industri. Daftar sekarang dan revolusi strategi rekrutmenmu!
targetAudiences: Kursus ini diperuntukkan bagi para perekrut, profesional SDM, spesialis akuisisi talenta, dan manajer perekrutan yang ingin mengintegrasikan AI ke dalam proses perekrutan mereka. Kursus ini juga ideal untuk pemilik bisnis, pendiri startup, dan siapa pun yang tertarik untuk memanfaatkan alat AI untuk mengotomatisasi dan mengoptimalkan strategi perekrutan. Baik Anda seorang pemula atau perekrut berpengalaman, kursus ini akan membantu Anda tetap terdepan dalam dunia perekrutan berbasis AI yang terus berkembang.

courseDetails.title: The Fastest Path to Product Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Discover the start-to-finish product development process
courseDetails.longDescription:
[100% of proceeds from this course go to the Save the Children charity to help children in Gaza and worldwide.]


Have you ever wondered what a Product Manager actually does every day?

If you’re looking to swiftly transition into a career in product management i.e. the fastest way to become a product manager... or want to get promoted to a more senior product role? I have good news…

The truth is, you don’t need to be a technical expert to take a product from idea to launch anymore. In this day and age, 99% of the knowledge you really need, is a clear step-by-step process.

This checklist-defined process helped me turn any employee, intern or student into a product leader, capable of guiding cross-functional teams through the full product development life cycle.

Inside this comprehensive course, you’ll discover:

- The actual start-to-finish product development process revealed!

- An overview of all 5 stages (and sub-stages) of the product life cycle, including the people, roles and responsibilities required for each sub-stage

- The latest “hidden gem” AI tools to give you that edge at each stage, and fast-track your development

- An overview of all 5 stages (and sub-stages) of the product life cycle, including the people, roles and responsibilities required for each sub-stage


You'll also gain a free copy of the Product Innovation Process (previously sold for $697), used by start-ups, governments and corporations to build and launch successful products in multiple industries.


Simply print out the process document, and let's go through it together in this walkthrough course, and learn step-by-step everything a product manager does - from scratch. 


As an added benefit, you'll also get a free call with me to help you implement this process - or just to talk about anything, product, process, career... and life!


___________
targetAudiences: Aspiring product managers
Business analysts
Existing product managers

courseDetails.title: Adobe InDesign 2025 Perfect Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: Become Master in Adobe InDesign, To Be a Unique Designer.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course Title: Mastering Adobe InDesign

Course Overview: Unlock your creative potential and elevate your design skills with our immersive Adobe InDesign course. This comprehensive program is meticulously crafted for both beginners and intermediate users, offering a deep dive into the world of digital layout design. By the end of this course, you’ll be adept at creating stunning and professional-quality layouts for a variety of print and digital media.

Module Breakdown:

  1. Introduction to InDesign: Start your journey by familiarizing yourself with the InDesign interface. Learn how to navigate through the workspace, understand essential tools, and customize your workspace to suit your workflow. This module will also cover the basics of document setup, including creating and managing pages, understanding margins, bleeds, and guides, and setting up a grid system for consistent layout design.

  2. Typography Mastery: Typography is the cornerstone of any great design. In this module, you’ll explore advanced typographic controls to enhance your text layout. Learn how to use paragraph and character styles to maintain consistency throughout your document, master the use of text frames, and explore the creative possibilities with typographic effects and custom fonts.

  3. Graphics and Images: Bring your designs to life by integrating graphics and images seamlessly. This module covers the essentials of importing, placing, and manipulating images. Learn how to use the Links panel to manage your images, apply basic and advanced image effects, and ensure that your images are print-ready. You’ll also explore techniques for working with vector graphics and creating custom shapes.

  4. Styles and Formatting: Efficiency is key in design. Discover how to use and create paragraph, character, and object styles to speed up your workflow and maintain consistency across your projects. Learn how to utilize master pages to manage repetitive elements such as headers and footers, and how to set up and apply styles for tables and lists.

  5. Interactive Documents: In today’s digital world, interactivity is a game-changer. This module will teach you how to create interactive PDFs with buttons, hyperlinks, and multimedia elements. Explore the possibilities of digital publishing with e-books, and learn how to create engaging digital documents that are compatible across various devices.

  6. Advanced Techniques: Take your skills to the next level with advanced techniques such as data merge for automated layouts, liquid layouts for adaptive designs, and content collection and management. This module will also cover preflight and packaging to ensure your documents are error-free and ready for print or digital distribution.

  7. Project-Based Learning: Apply your skills in real-world scenarios with project-based learning. Throughout the course, you’ll work on projects that replicate actual design briefs, helping you to build a portfolio that showcases your capabilities. Get personalized feedback from industry experts to refine your work and boost your confidence.

Why This Course? This course isn’t just about learning the tools; it’s about mastering the art of design. You’ll leave with a robust understanding of Adobe InDesign, empowered to create compelling and professional-grade layouts. Whether you’re an aspiring designer, a marketing professional, or just someone passionate about design, this course will elevate your skills and open new creative possibilities.

Ready to transform your design journey? Enroll today and start creating with confidence!
targetAudiences: This course is for printing designers
If you need to create or design books. magazines. newspapers don't worry this course is for you
Fluent english is not required

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course:  Professional Diploma in Omnichannel Sales & Service Management with AI & Chat Bots

You will know about: Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, Telegram, Apple, Wechat, Web, Bots and Chats Usage at Sales, Service, Digital Marketing

Modern customer communications expert.

After finishing of a course you will get: Double Diploma (UDEMY & RBS), Access to Interactive session and chat with Instructor and other students, ability to consider your real business and work questions and cases.


Course Plan:

1. About the coursre, topic and author

2. From calls to texting. Why digital channels become vital for literally any b2c business?

3. Introduction to the world of chatbots

4. AI chatbots: what they can and can’t do

5. Best practices: contact center

6. Best practices: ads, sales, loyalty and more

7. The most popular apps pt1: whatsapp, facebook, instagram

8. The most popular apps pt2: telegram, apple messages, wechat

9. Livechat: messaging on a company’s website

10. An Ideal customer journey framework

11. Interactive Session and Part


Course Author:

SLAVA POPKOV

Entrepreneur, CEO & Co-founder of Brandy. im
Modern customer communications expert

Education:

• Master of Applied Mathematics and computer science, The Saint-Petersburg State University

Experience:

• Serial entrepreneur with 12 years various business experience: founder of several companies: from local manufacture to b2b-SaaS startup

• Founder of Brandy. im – official message service provider of Apple Messages for business

• Experience of projects with global worldwide companies and banks

• Multiple Startup award winner


Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:

Hello everyone and welcome to the online-course created for any current or potential corporate managers from junior to executive level, that will make you stand out from the others.

This course might become your first step to acquire skill set, knowledges and maybe even a whole new profession, that is appearing right now. Learning it today, gives you advantages tomorrow!

I’m talking about digital transformation. In terms of customer communications in basically any meduim or big enterprises. And for small businesses, the most succesfull ones, they are already doing it in a modern way from the first day.

This transformation - it is a moving away from old way of communications, like phone calls, email, or even fax - to new way - whatsapp, facebook messenger, instagram direct messages, telegram - any messaging apps that people are using in their everyday life. And now they are starting to usу it to talk to businesses. To chat with an online store, with a bank, medical clinic - with any organization out there.

And here lies the opportunity!

All of these companies need employees or contractors who understand how to make this shift, this transition. New channels on the one hand bring a lot of new possibilities, such as chatbots and artificial intelligence, and on the other hand, require a rebuilding of current business workflows.

For example agent’s KPI in a contact centre based on whatsapp, is very different from a voice-based CC. And somebody need to know how to deal with it.

But the contact center is not the only place where apps like whatsapp are taking over. It affects pretty much every customer related departpent: sales, marketing and loyalty, support, customer experience, automation and online services.

So, Whether you plan to tie your career or business entirely to this feild, this knowledge will help you achieve your professional goals in a variety of ways. Because communication - is the essential part of business.

I started this journey seven years ago, when it was hardly even existed. Since then, I have worked with some of the world's biggest clients, such as Societe Generale, British american tobacco and others. Now I’m a founder of a startup called brandy. im

I invite you to my course where you will learn the basics about communications of the future. Welcome!



Before we start I want to give a quick intro of myself and also let’s take a look on the course plan.

So without further ado, here is what we will discuss

The course consists of 2 parts:

In a first one, everything down lesson 4, we are talking about the key benefits for business in general.

And then learning the basics of chatbots and AI.

The second part is becoming more specific.

We will see how exactly it implies to different departments. Discuss business application of particular messaging channels.

And with all of that we are getting ready to meet the main framework –

of ideal customer journey in modern channels. Which will be useful tool to any of your further projects.

And briefly about me.

You can call me Slava. For a last 7 years I’ve been running chat platform startup. For these years we made a lot of stuff, worked with some worldwide clients.

We have become official provider of apple messages for business. Not sure if this is my most significant achievement, but personally, the most pleasant one. A chance to work directly with apple team is really cool

and I have been honoured to become one of the business experts at the Retail banking school, where we are right now.

Feel free to connect or ask me anything on linkedin.

And, let’s jump in!

So I hope this online course will be a good start on mastering this new world of digital communications and happier customers


Linked topics:

  • Business Fundamentals

  • Marketing & Business Strategy

  • Online and Digital Business

  • Digital transformations / Strategy

  • Product Management

  • Continuous Process Improvement

  • Business and Entrepreneurship Fundamentals

  • Digital Marketing

  • Sales Skills

  • B2B Sales

  • B2C Sales

  • Customer Relationship Management

courseDetails.title: Gardner's Multiple Intelligences for Efficient Growth
courseDetails.shortDescription: Become the author of your life and take control of it (audio course)
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Intelligent Efficiency: Mastering Gardner's 8 Cognitive Domains for Personal Growth, a transformative course designed to reshape how you approach both personal and professional success. Based on my book The Autonomy Manifesto: Your Guide to Creating Your Own Reality, this course will guide you in unlocking your full potential by tapping into the cognitive strengths that make you unique.

Have you ever wondered why some tasks feel effortless while others seem like an endless struggle? What if the key to working smarter, not harder, was already within you—connected to the way you naturally think and process information? This course is built on the idea that intelligence is multifaceted, not one-size-fits-all. By identifying and understanding your dominant intelligences, you’ll be able to optimize your productivity, boost your creativity, and live a more fulfilling life.

Drawing from my own journey—overcoming dyslexia and becoming a successful entrepreneur—I’m here to show you that working in alignment with your strengths is the most effective path to lasting success. Through real-world insights and hands-on strategies, I’ll help you discover how to focus on what you do best, align your goals with your abilities, and create a sustainable plan for personal and professional growth.

What You’ll Learn:

  • Lesson 1: Introduction to Gardner's Multiple Intelligences: Discover how Howard Gardner’s theory redefines intelligence and how understanding your unique cognitive strengths can change the way you approach learning, problem-solving, and personal development.

  • Lesson 2: Linguistic Intelligence – Learn how to enhance your communication skills, articulate ideas clearly, and use language to influence and persuade others, whether in writing, speaking, or storytelling.

  • Lesson 3: Logical-Mathematical Intelligence – Strengthen your problem-solving abilities, improve decision-making, and develop your analytical thinking to approach challenges more efficiently.

  • Lesson 4: Spatial Intelligence – Explore how visualizing, organizing, and manipulating objects in space can boost creativity, productivity, and innovation in both personal and professional settings.

  • Lesson 5: Bodily-Kinesthetic Intelligence – Understand how physical movement and body awareness can improve your focus, productivity, and problem-solving skills. Learn how to integrate more movement into your daily life for better results.

  • Lesson 6: Musical Intelligence – Discover how music and rhythm can enhance creativity, focus, and emotional well-being. Learn how to use music strategically to improve your work environment and personal mindset.

  • Lesson 7: Interpersonal Intelligence – Master the art of understanding and interacting with others by developing emotional intelligence, active listening skills, and effective communication techniques for better teamwork and leadership.

  • Lesson 8: Intrapersonal Intelligence – Delve into self-awareness and emotional regulation, learning how to reflect on your inner thoughts and emotions to guide your personal growth and make decisions that align with your goals.

  • Lesson 9: Naturalist Intelligence – Connect with nature and learn how environmental awareness can improve your creativity, focus, and overall well-being. Optimize your workspace and life by embracing the power of nature in your surroundings.

  • Lesson 10: Intelligent Efficiency in Practice – Put everything together as we explore how to apply all eight intelligences in real-life scenarios, maximizing your productivity, creativity, and personal fulfillment through intelligent efficiency.

This course is for anyone—entrepreneurs, business professionals, students—who wants to optimize their strengths and achieve more with less effort. Whether you’re building your career, growing a business, or simply looking to improve your personal life, Intelligent Efficiency will give you the tools to reach your full potential.

If you’ve ever felt trapped in a cycle of hard work without seeing the results you want, this course will give you the clarity and strategies to break through. By the end, you’ll have a deep understanding of who you are, what your strengths are, and how to align your life with your natural abilities to create a more efficient, satisfying future.
targetAudiences: Professionals seeking to optimize their productivity and efficiency by aligning their work with their cognitive strengths for greater success in their careers.
Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to leverage their natural abilities to lead teams, grow their businesses, and innovate with ease and creativity.
Students and young adults aiming to identify and develop their unique intelligences to enhance learning, problem-solving, and personal development.
Individuals in career transitions who want to understand their strengths and align them with new professional goals or life changes for smoother adaptation.
Personal growth enthusiasts eager to deepen self-awareness, improve communication skills, and harness their cognitive abilities for ongoing personal development.
Anyone feeling overwhelmed by tasks that don't align with their strengths, looking for practical strategies to work smarter, reduce stress, and unlock their full potential.

courseDetails.title: Essentials for ArcPy: Python for Geospatial Automation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Automate GIS tasks, process raster and vector data, and develop custom tools.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the full potential of ArcPy with this comprehensive course, “Essentials for ArcPy: Python for Geospatial Automation.” Designed for GIS professionals, researchers, and anyone with a passion for spatial data, this course will teach you how to integrate Python with ArcGIS to streamline your geospatial workflows. By automating complex tasks, you’ll save time and enhance the accuracy and efficiency of your projects. Whether you're an experienced GIS user or a beginner, this course is structured to help you advance your skills.

In this course, you'll start by learning the basics of ArcPy, including how to set up your Python environment and how to navigate the Python Console in ArcMap for scripting and automation. The course progresses to cover working with vector and raster layers, performing geospatial analysis, and automating various GIS tasks like buffer creation, overlay analysis, and data extraction.

The hands-on examples include processing Landsat imagery for NDVI (Normalized Difference Vegetation Index) calculations and building ArcPy toolboxes for advanced Land Surface Temperature (LST) analysis. With practical exercises and quizzes, you’ll gain real-world experience in automating repetitive geospatial tasks, saving you time and effort.

By the end of the course, you'll have the confidence to write, modify, and execute ArcPy scripts. You will also be able to create reusable tools and automated workflows that can be applied across a variety of GIS projects. This course is an essential resource for anyone looking to harness the power of Python for geospatial analysis and automation.
targetAudiences: GIS Professionals: Individuals looking to automate geospatial analysis and streamline GIS workflows using Python and ArcPy.
Python Developers: Python programmers interested in applying their skills to geospatial automation and GIS data processing.
nvironmental Scientists: Professionals working with geospatial data, such as satellite imagery, for environmental monitoring and analysis.
Students and Researchers: Those in academic or research settings who want to learn how to use ArcPy for geospatial automation and analysis in their projects.

courseDetails.title: Essentials for PyQGIS: Python for Geospatial Automation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Automate GIS Tasks with Python: Master PyQGIS for Vector, Raster, and Processing Workflows
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the full potential of QGIS with PyQGIS, the powerful Python API for automating geospatial workflows. This course is designed for GIS professionals, researchers, and Python developers looking to streamline their GIS tasks through scripting.

Through hands-on exercises, you’ll learn how to:
- Automate geospatial data processing with PyQGIS
- Manipulate vector and raster layers programmatically
- Execute and chain QGIS processing algorithms
- Develop efficient GIS workflows using Python

By the end of this course, you'll have the confidence to automate repetitive GIS tasks, optimize workflows, and even develop your own custom QGIS plugins.

What You’ll Get:

- Step-by-step practical examples
- Real-world GIS automation scenarios
- Hands-on exercises to reinforce learning
- Guidance on advanced PyQGIS topics and more.

In addition to core concepts, this course covers best practices for writing clean and efficient PyQGIS scripts. You will also learn how to integrate Python with GIS databases, perform spatial analysis, and visualize geospatial data programmatically. No prior experience with PyQGIS is required, but basic knowledge of Python and GIS concepts will be helpful.

Whether you're a GIS analyst, researcher, or developer, this course will give you the skills to enhance your GIS automation using Python. Enroll now and take your QGIS scripting skills to the next level!
targetAudiences: GIS professionals looking to automate workflows. Python developers interested in geospatial analysis. Students and researchers working with GIS data. QGIS users wanting to enhance their scripting skills.

courseDetails.title: Django Essentials: Build and Deploy Real-World Apps
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Django by Building, Deploying, and Showcasing Real-World Web Applications
courseDetails.longDescription:
In this comprehensive course, you'll learn Django by building real-world web applications from scratch. Starting with the fundamentals, you'll learn how to set up your development environment, create Django projects, and design interactive applications. As you progress, you'll dive deeper into advanced features like class-based views, working with forms, setting up databases, and deploying your projects to a live server.

By the end of this course, you’ll have the skills to create fully-functional web apps and deploy them to the web. You’ll also learn how to showcase your project in a professional portfolio, making it easier to demonstrate your abilities to potential employers or clients.

What you'll learn:

  • Set up a Django development environment and create your first Django project

  • Build Django apps and map views to URLs

  • Work with databases, create models, and apply migrations

  • Explore Django’s admin interface and customize it for your needs

  • Develop class-based views and handle user input with forms

  • Deploy your Django project to a live server and showcase it professionally

Whether you're a Python developer looking to expand into web development or someone new to Django, this course will guide you through the entire process of mastering Django and building impressive web applications.
targetAudiences: Aspiring web developers looking to master Django.
Python programmers interested in web application development.
Anyone eager to learn and deploy dynamic web applications.
Students or professionals building a portfolio of real-world projects.

courseDetails.title: Programming for Scientific Research with Python and R

Conquer Scientific Data with Python and R!

Unleash the power of programming for your research!

This comprehensive, hands-on course equips you with the essential programming skills needed to tackle scientific data analysis and research projects. Whether you're a researcher, student, or simply curious about scientific computing, this course offers a perfect blend of Python and R to empower your scientific journey.

  • Gain a solid understanding of both Python and R programming languages.

  • Grasp essential file handling techniques in Python to manage your scientific data effectively.

  • Master data manipulation methods in R to organize and prepare your data for analysis.

  • Leverage powerful libraries like NumPy and SciPy in Python, and core R functionalities to perform statistical calculations crucial for your research.

Visualize Your Findings Clearly:

  • Craft informative and visually appealing graphs using Matplotlib in Python and ggplot2 in R.

  • Communicate your research results through compelling data visualizations, including advanced and animated graphs in R.

Dive into Artificial Intelligence:

  • Get an introduction to AI and apply deep learning techniques to scientific data using Python and R.

  • Explore practical applications like processing geospatial data and analyzing scientific datasets with AI.

Real-World Applications:

  • Apply your programming skills to practical case studies in scientific research.

  • Tackle real-world scenarios, including climate data analysis and remote sensing indices.

By the end of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Confidently navigate the world of scientific computing with Python and R.

  • Clean, manipulate, and analyze your scientific data with ease.

  • Conduct essential statistical analyses to support your research.

  • Apply AI techniques to enhance your data analysis capabilities.

  • Create impactful data visualizations to communicate your findings effectively.

Join us today and start conquering your scientific data with the power of Python and R!

courseDetails.title: Python for Scientific Research

Each lecture is crafted to provide you with actionable insights that you can apply immediately in your research. By the end of the course, you’ll be able to confidently use Jupyter Notebook for scientific research and develop custom Python scripts to tackle complex research challenges.

Sincerely,

Assist. Prof. Azad Rasul

courseDetails.title: FastPixel 2025: Mejora la Velocidad de Carga en WordPress
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende cómo mejorar la velocidad de carga de un sitio web de WordPress con el plugin FastPixel.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿QUÉ ES FASTPIXEL?

FastPixel es un plugin de caché y optimización de rendimiento para mejorar la velocidad de carga de los sitios web de WordPress. Combina optimización de imágenes, caché, CDN, minificación de código y carga diferida en una única solución, con configuración mínima.


¿CUÁLES SON LAS CARACTERÍSTICAS Y BENEFICIOS DE FASTPIXEL?


  • Reducir el impacto en la CPU/RAM : El uso del plugin reducirá el impacto en los recursos de su sitio web. Todo el procesamiento intensivo de la CPU se realiza en la nube y las páginas resultantes generalmente se servirán desde una versión en caché y las imágenes optimizadas desde la CDN.

  • Mejora del rendimiento del sitio web : simplemente active el complemento y en cuestión de segundos comenzarán a publicarse las páginas web optimizadas.

  • Reducir el impacto en la CPU/RAM : El uso del plugin reducirá el impacto en los recursos de su sitio web. Todo el procesamiento intensivo de la CPU se realiza en la nube y las páginas resultantes generalmente se servirán desde una versión en caché y las imágenes optimizadas desde la CDN.

  • Optimización automatizada de Core Web Vitals : FastPixel se encarga de todos los aspectos técnicos automáticamente.

  • Preparación/Actualización Inteligente de Caché : La preparación y actualización de la caché se realizan automáticamente de forma inteligente. Las páginas se almacenan en caché a medida que se visitan y también se actualizan si se actualiza el contenido.

  • CSS crítico : CSS se genera automáticamente para cada página para lograr cargas ultrarrápidas.

  • Procesamiento CSS/JS : los archivos CSS/JS se combinan, minimizan y comprimen antes de ser entregados desde nuestra CDN.

  • Optimización HTML : se genera un único archivo HTML altamente optimizado, que ofrece de forma adaptativa la página web ideal en función de la ventana gráfica o el dispositivo del visitante (por ejemplo, dispositivo móvil, tableta, computadora portátil).

  • Preconexiones DNS : acelera la obtención de recursos y reduce el tiempo de acceso a recursos externos.

  • Procesamiento de fuentes : se emplean todas las técnicas para acelerar el procesamiento y la entrega de fuentes, por ejemplo, subconjunto de fuentes, control de carga de fuentes, compresión de fuentes, incrustación de fuentes (resultado CLS más bajo).

  • Cambio de tamaño y optimización de imágenes : las imágenes se redimensionan automáticamente para adaptarse a sus marcadores de posición, se optimizan y se envían a través de ShortPixel CDN.

  • Entrega automática de imágenes de última generación : Según las capacidades del navegador del visitante, las imágenes JPG, PNG o GIF originales se convierten y se muestran como WebP o AVIF cuando son compatibles. Para navegadores no compatibles, se proporciona el formato original.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos optimizaremos la velocidad de carga de su sitio web de WordPress con el plugin FastPixel, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web optimizado y con un alto puntaje en herramientas de performance como PageSpeed y GTmetrix.


¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener e instalar FastPixel.

  • Cómo revisar y configurar correctamente todos los módulos del plugin FastPixel.

  • Cómo configurar la precarga de archivos Javascript en tu sitio web.

  • Cómo optimizar y reducir el peso las imágenes en tu sitio web.

  • Cómo configurar la caché de tu sitio web.

  • Cómo mejorar la velocidad de carga de tu sitio web de WordPress.

  • Cómo obtener la versión premium de FastPixel.

  • Cómo realizar un test de velocidad de tu sitio web.

Mastering Competency-Based Behavioral Interviews


Course Description:


Hiring the right talent is one of the most critical aspects of building a high-performing organization. Competency-based behavioral interviews help hiring managers, recruiters, and HR professionals assess candidates effectively by focusing on past experiences and demonstrated skills. This course is designed to equip you with the knowledge, techniques, and tools needed to conduct structured, competency-based interviews that lead to better hiring decisions.


Through practical case studies, real-world examples, and interview simulations, you’ll learn how to identify key competencies, structure behavioral interview questions, and evaluate candidate responses using a scoring system. Whether you are an HR professional, hiring manager, or recruiter, this course will enhance your interviewing skills and ensure you select the best-fit candidates for your organization.

What You’ll Learn:


The Fundamentals of Competency-Based Interviews – Understand the principles behind behavioral interviewing and how it improves hiring accuracy.


Developing a Competency Model – Learn how to define core competencies for different job roles and integrate them into the hiring process.


Crafting Effective Behavioral Interview Questions – Master the STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result) method and other structured interview techniques.


Evaluating Candidates Objectively – Implement competency-based scoring rubrics and minimize bias in the selection process.


Avoiding Common Interviewing Mistakes – Identify biases, pitfalls, and ineffective questioning methods that can lead to poor hiring decisions.


Improving Hiring Decisions with Data – Leverage competency frameworks, assessment grids, and interview scorecards for better decision-making.

• Case studies of companies using competency-based selection

Who Should Take This Course?


HR professionals & recruiters looking to refine their interview process and hire high-quality candidates.

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Wastewater Treatment
courseDetails.shortDescription: Wastewater and Sanitation Explained for Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Every day, we use water for our basic needs, such as drinking, bathing, cleaning, cooking, and laundry. However, by doing so, we generate every day millions of liters of wastewater which end up in the sewage network.

These sewage networks transport all wastewater to large facilities called wastewater treatment plants. where it undergoes complex transformations to make it less harmful to the receiving ecosystem.

Managing daily flows of millions of liters of wastewater can be challenging, as it threatens public health and ecosystems.

For a better understanding of how cities manage daily generated wastewater fluxes, we will discuss in this course the topics of sanitation, wastewater, and wastewater treatment from many angles.

To do so, we will use the following plan :


Introduction

Chapter 1: Sanitation & hygiene

Chapter 2: Consequences and challenges of unsafe sanitation

Chapter 3: Wastewater characterization

Chapter 4: Importance of wastewater treatment

Chapter 5: Basic concepts of wastewater treatment

Chapter 6: Wastewater treatment processes

Chapter 7: Challenges of wastewater treatment

Conclusion


By the end of this course:


- You will have a better understanding of domestic wastewater management works and the importance of safe sanitation.

- You will understand the importance of safe sanitation and wastewater facilities

- You will learn about wastewater composition and the processes used to treat wastewater

- You will gain insight into different environmental and economic challenges for wastewater and water management and conservation.


I hope you enroll & enjoy the course!


You can check more courses on drinking water treatment and seawater desalination on Green Courses.

keywords: water management, water conservation, water treatment, health, engineering, sustainability, ESG


Important Notice:


This course has been prepared with a specific audience in mind: learners looking for general knowledge about urban wastewater, the dangers of unsafe sanitation, wastewater treatment … and does not delve into engineering design and calculations of wastewater treatment.

That’s why:

- The course is suited for general public and provides high quality and concentrated knowledge about the importance of safe sanitation and how wastewater treatment works.

- The course is not suited for professionals, engineers and researchers looking for calculations and designs of wastewater treatment processes.


(No artificial intelligence tools (chatgpt, generative ai, prompts ..) were used in the development of this course, I believe this is important for providing an original learning experience for students).
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in sanitation & wastewater treatment & management

courseDetails.title: Social Recruiting: Facebook Recruitment, Linkedin Recruiter
courseDetails.shortDescription: Talent Sourcing | Twitter | Xing | GitHub | Pinterest | Boolean Search | Passive Candidates | Outreach | X-Ray | Youtube
courseDetails.longDescription:
Social Media Recruitment: From LinkedIn to Telegram


Course Description:


In today’s competitive talent landscape, traditional job boards often fall short in reaching passive candidates who aren’t actively seeking new opportunities. The Social Media Recruitment: From LinkedIn to Telegram course is designed to equip recruiters with the skills to effectively source and engage these passive candidates across various social media platforms. By mastering social media recruitment strategies, you’ll accelerate your hiring process, reduce costs, and gain a competitive edge in talent acquisition.


What You’ll Learn:

• Strategic Social Media Recruitment: Understand the importance of social media in accessing a broader talent pool and how it surpasses traditional job sites.

• Platform-Specific Sourcing Techniques: Gain proficiency in navigating and utilizing platforms such as LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, GitHub, and Telegram for candidate search and engagement.

• Advanced Search Methods: Learn to apply internal search functions, X-ray searches, and specialized plugins to identify and connect with potential candidates.

• Effective Candidate Outreach: Develop compelling communication strategies to approach passive candidates and build meaningful professional relationships.

• Utilizing Groups and Communities: Leverage social media groups, channels, and communities to find and attract niche talent.

• Ethical Considerations in Social Recruiting: Understand the ethical implications and best practices for recruiting via social media platforms.


Who Should Enroll:

• Recruiters and Talent Acquisition Specialists facing challenges in filling positions through traditional job postings.

• HR Professionals aiming to expand their sourcing strategies and reduce time-to-hire.

• Hiring Managers seeking to understand modern recruitment techniques to collaborate effectively with their HR teams.

• Anyone Interested in Recruitment looking to harness the power of social media to find and engage top talent.


Course Structure:

The program consists of 6 comprehensive lessons, each focusing on a specific social media platform or aspect of social recruiting. Lessons are released weekly, allowing participants to progressively build their skills. Each session includes recorded classes, practical assignments, and personalized feedback to ensure the application of learned techniques.


Key Modules:

1. Sourcing on Twitter, Pinterest, and Xing

• Understanding the unique features of each platform.

• Utilizing internal search options and X-ray search techniques.

• Interpreting social networking behaviors to inform recruitment strategies.

2. Recruiting via Facebook
